scripts.start-dev: npm run set-env ENVIRONMENT=dev node server.js
scripts.start-prod: npm run set-env ENVIRONMENT=prod node server.js
scripts.start-stage: npm run set-env ENVIRONMENT=prod PORT=8081 node server.js
scripts.dev-build: cd firebase-test && ng build && cd ../ && npm run set-env start-dev
scripts.stage-build: cd firebase-test && ng build --configuration=stage && cd ../ &&  npm run set-env  start-stage
scripts.prod-build: cd firebase-test && ng build --configuration=production && cd ../ &&  npm run set-env  start
